about.title: About MillionCXO
about.blurb: We help B2B companies book qualified meetings with real decision‑makers, not just leads. The future of outbound isn't automation; it's verified conversations backed by intelligence, process, and people.

items.quote: They don't spam; they research. Our CXO reply rate finally moved.

items.quote: The team hit their reply guarantees and kept meetings qualified.
